sentences.sContent: You’ll have to join the queue.
...and the fact that they're now at the end of the hiring queue just don't make it sensible to invest in them...

remMethod.val: q站在前面， 后面跟着ue ＋ ue， 真是一长队 → 长队

trans.tranOther: to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere
a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move
